Class XercesParserImpl

java.lang.Object
  sidekick.SideKickParser
      xml.parser.XmlParser
          xml.parser.XercesParserImpl

public class XercesParserImpl
extends XmlParser

A SideKick XML parser that uses this under the covers: reader = XMLReaderFactory.createXMLReader("org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser");
